verse: The Lord says to my Lord, “Sit at My right side, for those who hate You will be a place to rest Your feet.”
The Lord will send out Your strength from Zion, saying, “Rule in front of those who hate You.”
Your people will be willing to help in the day of Your power. Your young men will be dressed in holy clothes. They will come to You like water on the grass in the early morning.
The Lord has sworn and will not change His mind: “You are a Religious Leader forever, in the same way as Melchizedek.”
The Lord is at Your right hand. He will crush kings in the day of His anger.
He will say who is guilty or not among the nations. He will fill them with dead bodies. He will crush the leaders of many lands.
He will drink from the river on the way. And so He will lift up His head.
